title: Installation issue: Ambert Tools 20
body:
Hi,

We are trying to install AmberTools without success. We have downloaded the AmberTools20.tar.bz2 to the folder where spack is called (~). It gives us the following error.

```
==> Installing amber
==> No binary for amber found: installing from source
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed

/shared/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1270, in do_fetch:
       1267                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1268
       1269        self.stage.create()
  >>   1270        err_msg = None if not self.manual_download else self.download_instr
       1271        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1272        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1273
```
The spec is:
```
$ spack install amber@18.20 +mpi +openmp %intel
```

Information of the system
```
* **Spack:** 0.15.4-1609-caab89b
* **Python:** 3.8.6
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-zen2
```

The three stage folders present are empty
```
build_cache  
resource-AmberTools-atcyu4m75qh7radyd3t65acy5pofbzgi
spack-stage-amber-18.20-atcyu4m75qh7radyd3t65acy5pofbzgi
```

Maintainer @hseara 

There's a similar issue here but it's closed without any solution #14063 

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
